text: tatha (he nabee!) inase us nagaree ke sambandh mein prashn karo, jo samudr (laal saagar) ke sameep thee, jab usake nivaasee sabt (shanivaar) ke din ke vishay mein aagya ka ullanghan[1] kar rahe the, jab unake paas unakee machhaliyaan sabt ke din paanee ke oopar tairakar aa jaatee theen aur sabt ka din na ho, to nahin aatee theen. isee prakaar, unakee avagya ke kaaran ham unakee pareeksha le rahe the
